name: book-search-to-notion
title: Book Search to Notion
description: Lets you search books in Raycast to import into a notion book database with all book properties.
author: plutotom

commands.name: search-book
commands.title: Search Book
commands.description: Search books to add to notion

tools.name: search-books-for-notion-ai
tools.title: Search Books for Notion AI
tools.description: Use AI to search for a book and add it's details to notion rather then you looking your self.

preferences.name: notionDatabaseId
preferences.title: Notion Database ID
preferences.description: The ID of your Notion book database

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
